newsitem.title: TURKEY: Istanbul gold prices down, volume steady.
newsitem.headline: Istanbul gold prices down, volume steady.

text.p: Volume on the Istanbul gold exchange firmed slightly to 565 kilos on Wednesday from Tuesday's 510 kilos in quiet trade, dealers said.
Gold closed down at $343.00 an ounce and 1,292,000 lira per gram, from $347.00 and 1,303,500 lira on Tuesday, in line with the world trends.
Dealers said free market demand was weak with the passing of Wednesday deadline to deliver gold bullion to the state mint.
All of the day's trade was conducted in the morning session with 85.0 percent of trade conducted in lira terms.
